quote:
One must say Yes to life and embrace it whenever it is found — and it is found in terrible places; nevertheless, there it is.

For nothing is fixed, forever and forever and forever, it is not fixed; the earth is always shifting, the light is always changing, the sea does not cease to grind down rock. Generations do not cease to be born, and we are responsible to them because we are the only witnesses they have.

The sea rises, the light fails, lovers cling to each other, and children cling to us. The moment we cease to hold each other, the moment we break faith with one another, the sea engulfs us and the light goes out.
Life is a combination of magic and pasta.
If we can't have everything, nothingness is true perfection.

heading: Why some people be mad at me sometimes
quote:
they ask me to remember

but they want me to remember

their memories

and i keep on remembering

mine.
There’s something so human about taking something great and ruining it a little so you can have more of it.
